English: The weather cleared over the mountains
Crowds set out onto the trails

Polski: Turyści nie zwracali uwagi na prognozy
English: Tourists paid no heed to forecasts
Storms could occur in the mountains
Turned back at the start of the storm

Polski: W kolejce do wejścia na szczyt
English: In line to reach the summit
In the very heart of the elements

Polski: Równolegle do akcji prowadzonej od kilku dni
English: Parallel to the operation that had been underway for several days
Rescue coordination center was set up
We heard first claps of thunder
We saw a woman who had been struck
Some had burns covering 30% of their body
Underway surgery to remove rock fragments
